author: aaugustin
message:
Added a warning about the {% url %} syntax change

at the point where it bites most beginners.

Refs #18787, #18762, #18756, #18723, #18705, #18689 and several duplicates.

files.patch:
@@ -550,5 +550,16 @@ with the :ttag:`url` template tag:
  • {{ poll.question }}
    • +.. note:: + + If ``{% url 'polls.views.detail' poll.id %}`` (with quotes) doesn't work, + but ``{% url polls.views.detail poll.id %}`` (without quotes) does, that + means you're using a version of Django â‰¤ 1.4. In this case, add the + following declaration at the top of your template: + + .. code-block:: html+django + + {% load url from future %} + When you're comfortable with writing views, read :doc:`part 4 of this tutorial ` to learn about simple form processing and generic views.
